item.title: gz establishes Sirius Studio with former JAPAN Studio producer Teruyuki Toriyama
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/gz-establishes-sirius-studio-with-former-japan-studio-producer-teruyuki-toriyama

"Creating games that light up the hearts of players."

gz has announced the establishment of Sirius Studio, a new game development studio headquartered in Tokyo, made up of various notable staff including former Sony Interactive Entertainment JAPAN Studio producer Teruyuki Toriyama. It will work on console and PC, virtual reality, and extended reality games with the goal of “creating games that light up the hearts of players” and becoming a “world-class development studio” whose works are recognized globally.

The studio’s founding staff include:

  • Executive vice president / executive producer Hideki Irie
    • Credits – SEGA Networks, SEGA, PlatinumGames
  • Company director and chief product officer / general producer Teruyuki Toriyama
    • Thirdverse producer credits – Soul Covenant
    • Sony Interactive Entertainment JAPAN Studio producer credits – Demon’s Souls (2020), Deracine, ASTO BOT Rescue Mission, Bloodborne and downloadable content “The Old Hunters,” Soul Sacrifice Delta, and Soul Sacrifice
  • President Tomohiro Suzuki
    • Also president and representative director of gz
  • Executive officer / producer Koh Okamura
    • Credits – Soul Covenant, DYSCHRONIA: Chronos Alternate, IA/VT Colorful, Soul Sacrifice Delta, Soul Sacrifice, The Last Story, Blue Dragon, Blinx 2: Battle of Time & Space, Choro Q HG 3, Choro Q HG 2, Godzilla Generations
  • Executive officer / producer Tsubasa Miyamoto
    • Credits – Soul Covenant, Altair Breaker, Resident Evil 7: biohazard (PS4), Virtua Fighter 5: Ultimate Showdown, the Xbox and PC ports of Yakuza 1 to 6, Resident Evil 2 (PS4), Resident Evil Revelations 2 (PS4), Deep Down, Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Dual Destinies.

Visit the Sirius Studio official website here.

item.title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves adds Hokutomaru
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/fatal-fury-city-of-the-wolves-adds-hokutomaru

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Andy Bogard and Mai Shiranui's young pupil.

Hokutomaru will be a playable character in fighting game Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, developer SNK announced.

Here is his character profile, via SNK:

Hokutomaru (voiced by Caleb Yen in English, Junya Enoki in Japanese)

  • Fighting Style: Koppo & Shiranui ninjutsu
  • Date of Birth: October 7
  • Blood Type: O
  • Cherishes: His master and all other Shiranui-style practitioners

Andy Bogard and Mai Shiranui’s young pupil. After the previous tournament, Hokutomaru traded his home in the mountains for the bustling metropolis that is South Town—with Terry’s help, that is. Despite having to grapple with the ups and downs that is “life in the city,” the fledgling Shiranui fighter spends a great deal of time wondering how to use his abilities to help those around him. With the latest tournament now close at hand, Hokutomaru decides it’s the perfect opportunity to see how he has grown.

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on April 24.
